feedback.Physical Object: Included — A discrete, bounded crystal of frozen water.
feedback.Biological/Biomimetic: Excluded — Not of biological origin or inspired by biology.
feedback.Powered: Excluded — Exists passively; requires no energy source.
feedback.Structural: Included — Its crystalline symmetry defines its physical identity.
feedback.Observable: Included — Visible to the naked eye or via magnification.
feedback.Active: Excluded — Does not initiate behavior or internal change autonomously.
feedback.Intentionally Designed: Excluded — Formed by natural atmospheric conditions, not design.
feedback.Outputs Effect: Excluded — Does not emit energy, force, or signal.
feedback.Processes Signals/Logic: Excluded — No capacity for computation or signal handling.
feedback.State-Transforming: Excluded — Changes only under external heat; not self-transforming.
feedback.Human-Interactive: Excluded — Not designed for human engagement.
feedback.Functionally Autonomous: Excluded — No internal agency or operational logic.
feedback.System-Essential: Excluded — Not core to any structured system.
feedback.Symbolic: Excluded — Cultural symbolism is external, not intrinsic.
feedback.Signalling: Excluded — Does not convey structured information.
feedback.Rule-governed: Excluded — Follows physical laws, not abstract rule systems.
feedback.Compositional: Excluded — Not an abstract system of meaningful subunits.
feedback.Normative: Excluded — Does not guide or constrain behavior.
feedback.Temporal: Excluded — Not intrinsically defined by sequence or timing.
feedback.Digital/Virtual: Excluded — Exists only as physical matter.
feedback.Social Construct: Excluded — Exists independently of human classification.
feedback.Institutionally Defined: Excluded — Not defined or categorized by institutions.
feedback.Identity-Linked: Excluded — Not associated with roles or social identity.
feedback.Regulated: Excluded — Not subject to legal or institutional control.
feedback.Economically Significant: Excluded — Holds no intrinsic economic value.
feedback.Ritualised: Excluded — Not used in cultural or symbolic ritual.

encoding_notes: This encoding captures a snowflake strictly as a physical ice crystal. Symbolic and abstract interpretations are excluded. Structural identity is retained, but no modularity or system-level function is present.
